snippet: The United Nations appealed on Monday for more than $2 billion to feed and care for 20 million people across Africa’s Sahel belt.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations appealed on Monday for more than $2 billion to feed and care for 20 million people across Africa’s Sahel belt.
